title: Obari
author: Obari
created_time: November 16, 2022, 06:17:51 PMLast edit: September 19, 2023, 07:13:01 PM by Obari
content: I buy and also sell all country gift cards such as ~Roblox cards~Amazon gift cards~steam gift cards~Google play gift cards~ iTunes and lots moreJust send a pm in case I don't respond on the thread and I also have good rates as well as swift payments in cryptocurrencies.In partnership with zenland, an Ethereum-powered smart-contract platform, I will be offering a $10 discount for every transaction made with me to ensure that my services are trustworthy and transactions with me through zenland is secured without any third-party.Escrow sponsored by Zenland

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: nnicheware on January 06, 2023, 04:47:11 AMInterested inn sunglass hut? usaJust in case I don't respond very fast on the thread, please do well to send me a pm and I will be available to trade with you.Thanks

comments.author: jpog54
comments.body: I'm limited one private message an hour, since my account is brand new. Do you mind giving me your telegram? We can complete the deal, if we reach an agreement, through the forum escrow

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: Wild-West.Trade on February 03, 2023, 08:13:14 PMI'm looking to buy Amazon gift cards (paid cash with receipt, just need picture) at a 30% discount in exchange for bitcoin. If your interested let me kno.w I'm sorry I don't sell gift cards but I rather buy and I'm always available to buy all your gift cards just in case you have any deal for me.Thanks and hoping to work with you soon.Quote from: jpog54 on February 27, 2023, 08:19:12 AMI'm limited one private message an hour, since my account is brand new. Do you mind giving me your telegram? We can complete the deal, if we reach an agreement, through the forum escrow@sakaexchange is my telegram handle and you can always reach at all times and I'm available to discuss more deals with you asim always fair with my trade.Looking forward to trading with you.

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: Obari for gift cards like the Amazon gift card, is it possible to use escrow and payment is released from escrow to you after getting tracking number

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: Woodie on February 28, 2023, 08:52:00 PMObari for gift cards like the Amazon gift card, is it possible to use escrow and payment is released from escrow to you after getting tracking number Yes sir but provided is a trusted escrow and you'll be paying for the charges as well.Do well to check your inbox please

comments.author: Crydeal
comments.body: Want to buy some steam games, so would you accept payment through crydeal.com?

comments.author: Agbe
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on November 16, 2022, 06:17:51 PMI buy and also sell all country gift cards such as ~Roblox cards~Amazon gift cards~steam gift cards~Google play gift cards~ iTunes and lots moreJust pm and I also have good rates and payment are swiftly. if I were you, I would have added some the cards you used as a pictorial icons on the op to make the thread more attractive. Like this it's look like just a mere saying. Go and add some images in the thread. And also add your payment methods for buying and link it to the site if possible that will make the sellers easily access the payment without stress. Or you create a website for this service and drop the site link here. I just want you to make your services more authentic and not in this plain format. Though you must start from somewhere. Make your service real. And that is all I can say for now.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on June 16, 2023, 03:04:49 PMQuote from: Obari on November 16, 2022, 06:17:51 PMI buy and also sell all country gift cards such as ~Roblox cards~Amazon gift cards~steam gift cards~Google play gift cards~ iTunes and lots moreJust pm and I also have good rates and payment are swiftly. if I were you, I would have added some the cards you used as a pictorial icons on the op to make the thread more attractive. Like this it's look like just a mere saying. Go and add some images in the thread. And also add your payment methods for buying and link it to the site if possible that will make the sellers easily access the payment without stress. Or you create a website for this service and drop the site link here. I just want you to make your services more authentic and not in this plain format. Though you must start from somewhere. Make your service real. And that is all I can say for now.Yeah thanks for the advice senior and I already made considerations for all of that but since I'm still operating locally, I'm trying g to take things one step at a time a d I've also considered creating  an app for that so as to enable people get authentoc access to my services.Thanks and I'm grateful for  the advice and always available  to trade all country gift cards but ecodes and physical cards as my payments are swift and flexible.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: Quote from: Obari on June 16, 2023, 04:44:11 PMQuote from: Agbe on June 16, 2023, 03:04:49 PMQuote from: Obari on November 16, 2022, 06:17:51 PMI buy and also sell all country gift cards such as ~Roblox cards~Amazon gift cards~steam gift cards~Google play gift cards~ iTunes and lots moreJust pm and I also have good rates and payment are swiftly. if I were you, I would have added some the cards you used as a pictorial icons on the op to make the thread more attractive. Like this it's look like just a mere saying. Go and add some images in the thread. And also add your payment methods for buying and link it to the site if possible that will make the sellers easily access the payment without stress. Or you create a website for this service and drop the site link here. I just want you to make your services more authentic and not in this plain format. Though you must start from somewhere. Make your service real. And that is all I can say for now.Yeah thanks for the advice senior and I already made considerations for all of that but since I'm still operating locally, I'm trying g to take things one step at a time a d I've also considered creating  an app for that so as to enable people get authentoc access to my services.Thanks and I'm grateful for  the advice and always available  to trade all country gift cards but ecodes and physical cards as my payments are swift and flexible.You are no longer only operating your business model locally, but rather internationally, as a result of bringing the type of service you provide to the forum (buying and selling of all-country gift cards). This is because you have drawn everyone's attention to the service you provide by bringing it to the forum. I'll suggest that you follow Agbe's instructions so that you can be reached easily and that this thread has a visual representation of all the gift cards you've provided. I hope this business of yours does well for you soon. One love to you my Naija brother.

Make your service real. And that is all I can say for now.Yeah thanks for the advice senior and I already made considerations for all of that but since I'm still operating locally, I'm trying g to take things one step at a time a d I've also considered creating  an app for that so as to enable people get authentoc access to my services.Thanks and I'm grateful for  the advice and always available  to trade all country gift cards but ecodes and physical cards as my payments are swift and flexible.You are no longer only operating your business model locally, but rather internationally, as a result of bringing the type of service you provide to the forum (buying and selling of all-country gift cards). This is because you have drawn everyone's attention to the service you provide by bringing it to the forum. I'll suggest that you follow Agbe's instructions so that you can be reached easily and that this thread has a visual representation of all the gift cards you've provided. I hope this business of yours does well for you soon. One love to you my Naija brother. Thank you so much mate and I do enjoy seeing recommendations from senior fellows and as I said earlier, I'm still working  towards having a proper branding and represent  of the business but until then, I hope you guys keep patronizing me as it will go a very long way to aid the business growth. One love brother.

comments.body: I’m still very active to receive all your cards and also help trade your coins.Please slide in my pm and also remember that I offer a $10 discount for every trade that goes through Zenland escrow.The discount is powered by Zenland escrow services and every member both new and old are also very much welcome to trade with the $10 discount.Cheers
